name: fantasy-flag-football-or-thats-what-they-want-you-to-think
title: Fantasy Flag Football, Or That’s What They Want You To Think
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Nashvillest attended a fantasy flag football game last night, or so it seems. Regardless of what the Nashville Sports League says, we promise you that a couple of intense flag football games went down last night between Banditos vs. Big Love and Banditos vs. TBD, and there’s a few more to come. Teams play Monday nights at the Boys & Girls Club on Thompson Lane. It looks like games for this season only run through next week, so take this opportunity to show up and cheer for the Banditos, because theirs is the only schedule we can find on the intarwebs.
